description: The Golden Spaniard is an amazing plant species known for its gorgeous golden-yellow foliage. As an incredibly hardy and versatile plant, the Golden Spaniard is an ideal choice for a wide variety of landscaping applications. It grows in a neat and tidy mound, making it an excellent option for edgers, raised beds, or rock gardens. Best of all, its foliage transforms throughout the season to take on a stunning golden hue, creating impressive visual impact in any space. With exceptional cold-hardiness and the ability to thrive in full-sun conditions, the Golden Spaniard is a truly remarkable plant.
